about_the_game:
EXPLORATION


Embark on a journey through a beautiful and tranquil forest, full of secrets and stunning landscapes waiting to be discovered. Uncover the mysteries that lie beneath the tree canopies as you search for valuable resources to aid in your survival.

BUILDING


Become one with nature by building and customizing your own cabin from scratch, transforming it into your cozy sanctuary amidst the tall trees.

COOKING


Prepare delicious meals using the mushrooms you find throughout the forest. Experiment with different recipes and flavors to satisfy your hunger.

name: Under Canopies Demo
